title: Iron Man's Job Shadow

| Plot                    =After seeing a young fan dressing as him, [[Anthony Stark (Earth-13122)|Iron Man]] decides to play and train with the kid. However, [[Loki Laufeyson (Earth-13122)|Loki]] attacks, leaving the fan to finish the job and take Loki out. 

| Trivia                  =*This is a stop motion made by Paganomation in association with The LEGO Group. 
|ProductionCompanies=Paganomation}}
